Do you have steps to reproduce and versions?  When I created a Java application, created a JSP file, and then opened the new JSP with WPE, everything seems normal and no error was logged.

1) Create a new dynamic web project+JSF.
2) Create a simple JSF/JSP page such as the login.jsp.
3) Close the editor.
4) Remove the JSF facet from the project.
5) Open the editor on the login.jsp page.

I am not getting the same result, and the WPE opens, but am getting the following.   I am thinking that the problem is seems to be in the  TLD Document code somehow, but I am not positive.   Will keep looking.
